content: homestead cables hat charlo/e pruden abbreviabons k -­ knit supplies p -­ purl 1 skein plymouth homestead m1p -­ make 1 purl pick up ladder between sbtches from us #7 16 circular back to front purl in front leg of sbtch 1 sbtch increased us #7 dpns k2tog -­ knit 2 sbtches together sbtch marker p2tog -­ purl 2 sbtches together cable needle ssk -­ slip 1 sbtch as if to knit slip 2nd sbtch as if to knit insert le\ needle into front of both sbtches and knit gauge together 4 sts/inch in unstretched twisted rib c6b -­ slip 3 sbtches to cable needle and hold in back of work knit 3 off le\ needle knit sbtches off cable needle instrucbons co 96 sbtches onto circular needle place marker join in round and begin ribbing work twisted 1x1 rib -­ *k1tbl p1* -­ for 1 75 increase round -­ *k6 p1 m1p p1* repeat around 108 sbtches total work *k6 p3* around for a total of 4 rounds begin cable pa/ern round 1 *c6b p3* repeat around rounds 2-­ 8 *k6 p3* repeat around repeat rounds 1-­ 8 twice more for a total of 3 repeats if a longer hat is needed or desired conbnue in pa/ern ending a\er row 8 work rounds 1-­ 5 and begin decreases decreases round 1 *k6 p2tog p1* repeat around round 2 *k6 p2* repeat around round 3 *c6b p2* repeat around round 4 *k6 p2* repeat around round 5 *k6 p2tog* repeat around round 6 *k6 p1* repeat around round 7 *ssk k2 k2tog p1 k6 p1* repeat around round 8 *k4 p1 ssk k2 k2tog p1* repeat around round 9 *ssk k2tog p1 k4 p1* repeat around round 10 *k2 p1 ssk k2tog p1* repeat around round 11 *k2tog p1 k2 p1* repeat around round 12 *k1 p1 k2tog p1* repeat around round 13 *k2tog* round 14 *k2tog* 6 sbtches remain break yarn pull tail through remaining loops weave in ends copyright © 2014 by charlo/e pruden of charlo/eknits com pa/ern for personal use only should you like to teach sell the finished object or distribute the pa/ern you must receive express wri/en permission before doing so all rights reserved
